name: CV | Resume ( No B***sh** )
description:
Update:

Attached are 2 Resume for use of professional career. It DOES NOT include the Bullshit design and only focuses on clean and simple way to communicate the skills of a candidate.


Advantages of Use:

  • Dark Mode + Light Mode
  • ATS Proof Design (ATS stands for Applicant Tracking System)
  • Built on Auto-Layout to responsively adjust so you won't have to re-design!
  • Advices added in each section separately, to avoid ATS score penalty.
  • Must use design for modern B2B and B2C start-ups!
